name: Frozen Hearth (itch)
description:
The Winter Queen has taken Kai to her icy realm. Play as Gerda, Kai’s closest friend. Run through the enchanted winter forest, dand odge obstacles and monsters. Ensure your torch is always lit through the fireplaces spread around the area.

If you lose your warmth, Gerda will suffer from cold and the game is lost! If you feel like taking a challenge – you can enable the timer feature and try to get the highest record!

Frozen Hearth team:

  • Briek Keters
  • Christian Fedrau
  • Tinca Antohi
  • Jérémy Jägers
